channel.title: Chamleon on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Chamleon
item.description: 2020 February 22nd @ Bangalore Slippery, scaly reptilian. Reptile in general, sniper in nature eats victims for dinner. Hunted by poachers but valued by farmers. For eliminating pesky pestering pests weapon of choice is its own tongue; Must have marksman ship for degree. Could you guess the animal? Not a monster, It is a hidden chameleon.
